definition: tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man

sentences.english: The term "New Generation" refers to the last group of writers in the late 20 th century Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 新生代是二十世紀末中國文壇最後一個作家羣。

sentences.english: It looks like the world could be a much hotter place by the end of the century.
sentences.chinese: 貌似到本世紀末地球上溫度會比現在高很多。

sentences.english: By the end of the century, the men's ready-to-wear apparel industry was well established.
sentences.chinese: 到了該世紀末，男式成衣業已經牢固地建立起來了。

sentences.english: Dating from the end of the 19th century, Japan began to be engaged in the narco-trafficking in Fujian .
sentences.chinese: 早在十九世紀末，日本就開始在福建從事販毒活動。

sentences.english: And seen from this end of the century it's not hard to see why.
sentences.chinese: 從本世紀末的目標中，就不難看出這是什麼原因。

sentences.english: The variational method is a branch of mathematics, and was developed in the 17th century.
sentences.chinese: 變分法是17世紀末發展起來的一門數學分支。

sentences.english: All of these have earned him a well-deserved representative of the aesthetic culture in the fin-de-siecle.
sentences.chinese: 這一切就使他成爲了“世紀末”審美文化的典型代表。

sentences.english: In the late eighth century, the Vikings attacked England.
sentences.chinese: 在8世紀末，斯堪的那維亞人攻佔英國。

sentences.english: And probably by the end of the first century, all of this was organized in some way.
sentences.chinese: 大約在一世紀末，這些著作就被整理出來了。

sentences.english: The crusades began at the end of the Eleventh Century. They continued for about two-hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 聖戰從十一世紀末開始，一直延續了大約兩百年。

sentences.english: In addition, this part discusses the process that the compradors of Xiangshan changed to the national entrepreneur in 19 century.
sentences.chinese: 論述了19世紀末香山買辦向民族企業家轉變的過程。

sentences.english: By the end of this century, continued warming will turn extra snow into rain.
sentences.chinese: 到本世紀末，持續的變暖將會令增加的雪變成雨。

sentences.english: As a result, Gregorian chant fell into complete decadence by the end of the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 結果格立高聖歌在中世紀末完全衰落。

sentences.english: The 21st century will appear knowable space-time machine, people will have back into the past.
sentences.chinese: 可知21世紀末將出現時空機，人們將紛紛回到過去。

sentences.english: During the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries, the use of apostrophes became more consistent.
sentences.chinese: 在19世紀末20世紀初，撇號的使用變得更加統一。

sentences.english: At the end of the 18th century, the flushable toilet went mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 到了18世紀末，可沖洗的廁所以及成爲了主流。

definition: start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
Heian period (794-1185), period of Japanese history
